about_the_game:
Violet Wisteria is a nod to the late 80s and early 90s golden era of Japanese gaming. You control Wisteria Asagiri on her quest to stop the dark wizard Maskandes from conquering both the Higher Realm and Earth.

Violet Wisteria introduces an unprecendented "tri-color attack system" which the player must master to progress. Wisteria can use three different sword attacks, each with their own color attribute, to defeat enemies which appear randomly as palette swaps of the same three colors. Think rock scissors paper, but with colors instead of symbols. This attack mechanic must be used to overcome obstacles and action gimmicks in each of the game's stages, as well as the intricate boss fights.

This demo contains the first two stages out of eight which will be in the final version.

Violet Wisteria is a nod to the late 80s and early 90s golden era of Japanese gaming. You control Wisteria Asagiri on her quest to stop the dark wizard Maskandes from conquering both the Higher Realm and Earth.

Violet Wisteria introduces an unprecendented "tri-color attack system" which the player must master to progress. Wisteria can use three different sword attacks, each with their own color attribute, to defeat enemies which appear randomly as palette swaps of the same three colors. Think rock scissors paper, but with colors instead of symbols. This attack mechanic must be used to overcome obstacles and action gimmicks in each of the game's stages, as well as the intricate boss fights.

This demo contains the first two stages out of eight which will be in the final version.
name: Violet Wisteria Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4600
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: A 2D platformer straight out of the year 1991. Relive the magic of the golden era of gaming and push your reflexes and endurance to their limit.
